items.content_html: TiKo is a lightweight, asynchronous check-in system designed to help teams reduce or eliminate the need for daily standup meetings. It allows users to share daily Pulses‚Äîshort, structured updates on what they're working on, blockers, and progress‚Äîat their own pace, without the pressure of real-time meetings.

items.content_html: FormVerbJS is a lightweight JavaScript library that enables you work with forms and their elements effortlessly. It takes away the hassle of writing bunch of codes in order to access form elements in JavaScript allowing you focus on making the best use of your form values.
